alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 9:47PM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18 affecting Henderson and Des Moines Counties. Mississippi River at Burlington affecting Lee, Des Moines, Henderson and Hancock Counties. Mississippi River at Dubuque LD11 affecting Dubuque and Jo Daviess Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Iowa... Mississippi River at Dubuque affecting Jackson, Dubuque and Jo Daviess Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Gladstone LD18. * WHEN...From Monday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Monday evening and continue rising to 10.7 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
